name: Common Slime
facts: Slimes can be found throughout dungeons all over the world. They can survive and adapt to any type of environment, making them a menace to dungeon ecosystems without adventurers to keep their numbers in check.

research_tasks.question: I’ve always wondered if slimes have a favourite food… I swear they just eat anything and everything.
research_tasks.completion: Slimes don’t appear to prefer any one food type.

name: Forest Dinglebat
facts: Dinglebats are known for their affinity for fruits and can be seen darting between trees in search of their next snack. They are shy creatures and often hide from adventurers.

research_tasks.question: What type of fruit do Dinglebats prefer the most?
research_tasks.completion: Dinglebats seem to have a preference for berries over other fruits.

name: Common Shrooman
facts: Shroomen seem to be able to communicate with others of their species without the need for vocalisations or body language.

research_tasks.question: How do Shroomen communicate?
research_tasks.completion: It appears they communicate through a network of fungal threads that spread underground. I wonder how far they can go?

name: Plains Imp
facts: Plains Imps are mischievous creatures known for causing trouble in farming areas. They are fast and agile, making them difficult to catch.

research_tasks.question: What is the best way to trap a Plains Imp?
research_tasks.completion: Using meat as bait seems to be the most effective way to lure and trap a Plains Imp.

name: Shallows Jelly
facts: Shallows Jellies are often seen floating near the shorelines. They have a translucent body that makes them difficult to spot in the water.

research_tasks.question: How do Shallows Jellies defend themselves?
research_tasks.completion: Shallows Jellies release a mild toxin when threatened, which is enough to deter most predators.

name: Nekomata
facts: Nekomata are feline creatures known for their dual tails and mysterious powers. They are often found in the mountains, where they live in solitude.

research_tasks.question: What powers do Nekomata possess?
research_tasks.completion: Nekomata are said to have the ability to control fire and communicate with spirits. Their dual tails are a symbol of their magical prowess.
